attributes.action: Change the policy and procedures of the child maintenance service.
attributes.additional_details: Attachment of CM payments to credit scores as standard.  Any missed payments AT ALL automatically effect the non payers credit score, borrowing ability, interest rates.  Scrap enforcement actions.  These actions have been proven not to work time and time again.  They’re expensive to implement have an unsuccessful ratio i.e money spent on paperwork admin etc to actually retrieving funds.  This is a waste of government funding.  Be able to take non payers to court independently of the CMS
attributes.background: Agree to necessary changes to the CMS procedures.  Make non payment of child maintenance harder to achieve. Make non payment of CM a punishable offence in the form of credit scores and independent court proceedings.  DWP needs to bridge CM payments after 12 months of failed retrieval attempts.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government aren't responsible for credit scoring, or deciding what can change credit scores.
